verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> He Began <S%G756><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Parables <S%G3850><s%> , To Say, <S%G3004><s%> A Vineyard <S%G290><s%> Planted <S%G5452><s%> A Man, <S%G444><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Placed About It <S%G4060><s%> A Fence, <S%G5418><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Dug <S%G3736><s%> A Wine Vat, <S%G5276><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Built <S%G3618><s%> A Tower, <S%G4444><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Out <S%G1554><s%> It <S%G846><s%> To Husbandmen, <S%G1092><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Left The Country. <S%G589><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Husbandmen <S%G1092><s%> At The <S%G3588><s%> Season <S%G2540><s%> A Bondman, <S%G1401><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Husbandmen <S%G1092><s%> He Might Receive <S%G2983><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Vineyard. <S%G290><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Beat, <S%G1194><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sent Him Away <S%G649><s%> Empty. <S%G2756><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> He Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Bondman, <S%G1401><s%> And Him <S%G2548><s%> Having Stoned <S%G3036><s%> They Struck On The Head, <S%G2775><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sent Him Away <S%G649><s%> Having Insulted Him. <S%G821><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> He Sent, <S%G649><s%> And Him <S%G2548><s%> They Killed; <S%G615><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Others, <S%G243><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Some <S%G3303><s%> Beating, <S%G1194><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And Others <S%G1161><s%> Killing. <S%G615><s%>

Yet <S%G2089><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> , Having <S%G2192><s%> Beloved <S%G27><s%> His Own, <S%G846><s%> He Sent <S%G649><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Last, <S%G2078><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> They Will Have Respect For <S%G1788><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> My Son. <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G1565><s%> But Those <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Husbandmen <S%G1092><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> Among <S%G4314><s%> <S%G1438><s%> Themselves, <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heir : <S%G2818><s%> Come, <S%G1205><s%> Let Us Kill <S%G615><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ours <S%G2257><s%> Will Be <S%G2071><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Inheritance. <S%G2817><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Killed Him, <S%G615><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cast Forth Him <S%G1544><s%> Outside <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Vineyard. <S%G290><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Will Do <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Vineyard? <S%G290><s%> He Will Come <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Destroy <S%G622><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Husbandmen, <S%G1092><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Give <S%G1325><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Vineyard <S%G290><s%> To Others. <S%G243><s%>

Not Even <S%G3761><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1124><s%> This Scripture <S%G3778><s%> Did Ye Read? <S%G314><s%> The Stone <S%G3037><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Rejected <S%G593><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Build, <S%G3618><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1096><s%> Is Become <S%G1519><s%> Head <S%G2776><s%> Of The Corner : <S%G1137><s%>
From The <S%G3844><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Was <S%G1096><s%> This, <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> Wonderful <S%G2298><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3788><s%> Our Eyes. <S%G2257><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Sought <S%G2212><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Lay Hold Of, <S%G2902><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Feared <S%G5399><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd; <S%G3793><s%> <S%G1097><s%> For They Knew <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parable <S%G3850><s%> He Speaks. <S%G2036><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Leaving <S%G863><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Went Away. <S%G565><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Send <S%G649><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Herodians, <S%G2265><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Might Catch <S%G64><s%> In Discourse. <S%G3056><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> We Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> True <S%G227><s%> Thou Art, <S%G1488><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Is Care <S%G3199><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> No One; <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Thou Lookest <S%G991><s%> On The <S%G1519><s%> Appearance <S%G4383><s%> Of Men, <S%G444><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> ' With <S%G1909><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Teachest : <S%G1321><s%> Is It Lawful <S%G1832><s%> Tribute <S%G2778><s%> To Caesar <S%G2541><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Not? <S%G3756><s%>

Should We Give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G2228><s%> Or <S%G3361><s%> Should We Not Give? <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hypocrisy <S%G5272><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Do Ye Tempt? <S%G3985><s%> Bring <S%G5342><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> A Denarius <S%G1220><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> I May See It. <S%G1492><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Brought It. <S%G5342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Whose Is <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1504><s%> This Image <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Inscription? <S%G1923><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Caesar's. <S%G2541><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Render <S%G591><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Of Caesar <S%G2541><s%> To Caesar, <S%G2541><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God. <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Wondered <S%G2296><s%> ' At <S%G1909><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G386><s%> A Resurrection <S%G3361><s%> There Is Not. <S%G1511><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> Wrote <S%G1125><s%> For Us, <S%G2254><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Of Anyone <S%G5100><s%> A Brother <S%G80><s%> Should Die <S%G599><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Leave Behind <S%G2641><s%> A Wife <S%G1135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5043><s%> Children <S%G3361><s%> Leave Not, <S%G863><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Should Take <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wife <S%G1135><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Raise Up <S%G1817><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> To His Brother. <S%G846><s%>

Seven <S%G2033><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> There Were; <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Took <S%G2983><s%> A Wife, <S%G1135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Dying <S%G599><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Left No <S%G863><s%> Seed; <S%G4690><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Second <S%G1208><s%> Took <S%G2983><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Died, <S%G599><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Left <S%G863><s%> Seed; <S%G4690><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Likewise. <S%G5615><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Took <S%G2983><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven, <S%G2033><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Left No <S%G863><s%> Seed. <S%G4690><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman. <S%G1135><s%>

In The <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Resurrection, <S%G386><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> They Shall Arise, <S%G450><s%> Of Which <S%G5101><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> Shall She Be <S%G2071><s%> Wife? <S%G1135><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> As Wife? <S%G1135><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1223><s%> Therefore <S%G5124><s%> Do Ye Err, <S%G4105><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scriptures <S%G1124><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God? <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> For When <S%G1063><s%> From Among <S%G1537><s%> The Dead <S%G3498><s%> They Rise, <S%G450><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> Do They Marry <S%G1060><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> , Are Given In Marriage, <S%G1061><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Who Are <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G4012><s%> But Concerning <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> They Rise, <S%G1453><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Have Ye Not Read <S%G314><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Book <S%G976><s%> , Of Moses, In The Part <S%G3475><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bush, <S%G942><s%> How <S%G5613><s%> Spoke <S%G2036><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> I Am <S%G1473><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Abraham <S%G11><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Isaac <S%G2464><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Jacob? <S%G2384><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> He Is Not <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of The Dead, <S%G3498><s%> But <S%G235><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of The Living. <S%G2198><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Greatly <S%G4183><s%> Err. <S%G4105><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come Up <S%G4334><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes, <S%G1122><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Reasoning Together, <S%G4802><s%> Perceiving <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> He Answered, <S%G611><s%> Questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G4169><s%> Is The <S%G2076><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Commandment? <S%G1785><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Answered <S%G611><s%> , <S%G846><s%> Him, <S%G3754><s%> The First <S%G4413><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Commandments Is, <S%G1785><s%> Hear, <S%G191><s%> Israel : <S%G2474><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Our God <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Shalt Love The <S%G25><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Thy God <S%G4675><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Thy Heart <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> Thy Soul <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1271><s%> Thy Mind <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2479><s%> Thy Strength. <S%G4675><s%> This Is The <S%G3778><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Commandment. <S%G1785><s%>

And The <S%G2532><s%> Second <S%G1208><s%> , Like It Is <S%G3664><s%> This : <S%G846><s%> <S%G3778><s%> Thou Shalt Love <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Neighbour <S%G4139><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Thyself. <S%G4572><s%> Greater <S%G3187><s%> Than These <S%G5130><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Is Not. <S%G2076><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribe, <S%G1122><s%> Right, <S%G2573><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> ' According To <S%G1909><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> , Thou Hast Said <S%G2036><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> , God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Is Not <S%G2076><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Besides <S%G4133><s%> Him : <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Love <S%G25><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Understanding <S%G4907><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Soul <S%G5590><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Strength, <S%G2479><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Love One's <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Neighbour <S%G4139><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Oneself, <S%G1438><s%> More <S%G4119><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Than All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Burnt Offerings <S%G3646><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sacrifices. <S%G2378><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Intelligently <S%G3562><s%> He Answered, <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Far <S%G3112><s%> Art Thou <S%G1488><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3762><s%> No One Any More <S%G3765><s%> Dared <S%G5111><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Question. <S%G1905><s%>
